title: The day when The Rock joined Baywatch and South Park did Lorde | Culture | The Guardian
summary: can we all talk about cheryl 's 'woo '
oooh-hoo-hoo , it 's a new issue , featuring caribou .
and it 's another cracking review anything .
chromeo get in a bar brawl with haim , turn a dive bar into flashdance .

documents.title: can we all talk about cheryl 's 'woo '
text: woo ! ''
here 's michael cragg on the rest of the week 's pop hits .
that 's it from me .
i 'll be thinking about cheryl 's woo-ing all weekend , probably .
you 'll have better things to do , though .
things like : some exhibitions that are happening up and down the country the super weird happening in bristol , a party inspired by 60s counter cultural happenings , man .
or , in london , perhaps deviation at xoyo .
go and see gone girl , which opens in uk cinemas today .

documents.title: oooh-hoo-hoo , it 's a new issue , featuring caribou
text: and a lovely one it is too-ooo .

take a look at what you 'll get from all good ( and some bad - ho ho , i use this joke every week ) newsagents tomorrow , including thoughts on nicki minaj 's anaconda lyrics , some news about phil mitchell 's wedding , and liam neeson origin myth you always wanted to know .

documents.title: mike tyson solves mysteries now
text: in unlikely crime solving news , mike tyson is the star of a new adult swim series , mike tyson 's mysteries , in which he plays iron mike and bowls around uncovering mysteries , often using his fists and wearing a cowboy hat .
he 's helped by a posh ghost , his adoptive daughter and , as is always the way with adult swim animations , it seems , a talking pigeon .
it premieres on 27 october and is weekly from then .

documents.title: some friday bangers for you
text: route 94 has a new , deep and incredibly straightforward big-room house tune that you 'll probably hear loads this weekend , especially at the rinse : 20 party at ministry of sound in london .
this one has eve teaming up with london duo riddim commission ( aka marco del horno and swerve ) .
which is almost as good as the time she teamed up with benga .

this one 's a banger because it has an actual person banging an actual stool , which makes it more than a banger of most and finally , prolly the utmost in bangerism , a $ ap rocky has a new track feat .
juicy j , which has a bun b-rivalling number of bad words and an aggro-trap beat that does n't give a flying pack of cherry bakewells .
i feel angry after listening to it .
it 's an angry banger .
a bangry ?

documents.title: indie-country ? just say neigh
text: indie bands are up country like it ai n't no thang and guide writer david stubbs is n't happy about it .

you should definitely read his column all about it and , following on from luke 's quirky covers feature on yesterday 's guide daily , tell us what other bizarre examples of 'band 's going ' you can think of .
any grindcore bands gone pop yet ?

documents.title: and it 's another cracking review anything
text: shaw/the guide it 's that time of the day again where we call out for your creative handiwork and then squidge it , without remorse , under our critical boot .
this time we 've got acoustic ditties , comedy sketches and poetry written by children , submitted via twitter and fried by our snark-hungry feelings .
see how you 've fared .

documents.title: chromeo get in a bar brawl with haim , turn a dive bar into flashdance
text: got a spare six minutes ?
of course you do .
no spoilers or anything but basically you do not want to fck with haim or underestimate napoleon dynamite aka jon heder 's pulling power .
ever .
chromeo 's tarantino-ish extended video for old 45s ai n't exactly rewriting no rule book but it does make a day in the desert look a lot more fun .

documents.title: lorde 's concert was excellent last night
text: central/consequence of sound speaking of irl people in cartoon form , this is trey parker and matt stone 's very warped vision of the teenage popstar 's performance - a moustachioed drag act that turns out to be stan 's dad , randy marsh .
she cropped up on last night 's south park and gave the us music press something to wang on about for at least a day .
viner jared 's review is in and says she totally killed it '' .

documents.title: friday is now rock day ! watch those pecs dance
text: following the frankly erotic news that the rock will be starring in a baywatch movie , commenter somerandomperson put us onto this which should clearly be mandatory viewing for everyone .

documents.title: shaun of the dead back from the well , you know
text: yes .
simon pegg and nick frost resurrected shaun and ed from the film to appear in the disney channel 's phineas and ferb as part of the show 's halloween special .
hearing those voices together again is as soothing as the soft , familiar chafe of one 's favourite pair of rank and atrocious lucky pants .
but , lads : tim and mike .
please bring back tim and mike .
i miss them .
please .
do it now .
for all that 's good and holy i miss them so much .
etc .
here 's the original story over on the excellent den of geek .

documents.title: elijah wood sounds like he loves his new movie
text: a couple of weeks ago we posted about elijah wood 's new film , open window , in which the action takes place across various chat screens on a computer or , as other people like to call them , open windows .

we could n't work out whether it was genius or terrible - a game that 's really fun when it comes to wood 's recent films - but , thanks to this joyless promo , it seems that deep down wood knows the truth .
the word you 're looking for is n't exciting '' , it 's mygodthisissoridiculousi'msofarfromtheshire '' .
what do you think ?
tweet us @ twitterid

documents.title: welcome ya 'll to friday
text: we 've found friday and it 's going to be exceptional everyone .

we know this because here is a of the rock aka dwayne johnson aka the marlon brando of our age sitting atop a jetski , subtly announcing that fact that his sturdy pecs will greatly feature in the forthcoming baywatch movie .
if only all actors would slyly mention their forthcoming roles in this way .
perhaps we could have christian bale straddling an apple laptop .
or jamie doornan cracking a giant whip .
or eddie redmayne performing a science experiment with sweets like they do on those annoying maoam ads before the big bang theory .
it 's okay , i know , i get carried away .

bulletin.text: Pecs, respecks and pop culture trainwrecks - it's all here in Friday's scrollable entertainment guide.
Coming up: Dwayne Johnson on a jetski, Lorde as a middle-aged man and Courtney Love's pop opera.
Plus! It's #ReviewAnything time. Tweet us your submissions for a highly professional ribbing.
Get involved at @twitterid or regret every decision you make for the rest of today.
